title: I'm a musician. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: pick up your guitar and play just like yesterday What Cesar Martinez says - have fun. The benefits of playing a musical instrument seriously are profound and life long. The only downside is possible injury - but that can happen anytime, any place, any way. So just because you can get carpal tunnel from playing a guitar shouldn’t be a deterrent - computer keyboards can cause similar. As for a career - well, it was never a really high percentage move in the first place - the pandemic has not helped.

Well if you are a musician, you should put some music on some social media platforms like Tik Tok and Instagram. You will get at least 100 followers or more bec of your music. I have a friend that a record label person found her music and brought her into the studio and the made her music. So what I would do is post videos and you may get reconised.
